description: This script is used in a udev environment to manage mounting and unmounting block devices when they are added or removed. It handles systemd and traditional mount systems, performs device ignore checks, and automates mounting procedures based on device properties.

methods.name: rm_dir
methods.description: Removes a directory if it is empty or only contains the directory itself, with safeguards to prevent deletion of non-empty directories.

methods.name: get_label_name
methods.description: Retrieves the LABEL or PARTLABEL of a device and appends it to the device name if available, to generate a unique mount point name.
